name: Sphere Gear
description:
Sphere Gear is a Top Down multiplayer shooter featuring heroes with different abilities and spherical gravity. The game is currently in development to become a full online experience. At the moment the title is playable in local multiplayer.

At the actual state there are 3 different PvP arena game modes:

  • Duels
  • 2v2 Team Deathmatch
  • All vs All Deathmatch.

Input list:

  • Left stick: Move (also for cursor in selection screen)
  • A(X for PS controllers): selection
  • Back/Menu(in selection screen): Lock in hero
  • Select/Options(in selection screen): Hero description
  • Right stick: Aim
  • Right Trigger: Base Attack
  • LB /RB: Basic abilities
  • Left Trigger: Ultimate Ability

The use of 2 to 4 joypads (xbox or similar models) is highly advised. Sony controllers might give some problems on certain inputs. MK is still not supported on this version.
